div.p: Teaching the future leaders of the world

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

span.em: Welcome to the online home of the Harmony Area School District! We hope that you will find useful information and links to some of our latest events and news within our district website

span.style: font-size: 20px; text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
text-align: center; font-size: 20px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.a:
* Most Recent Update from
Acting Superintendent Mr. Dale Kirsch *

br.br:
Also: HASD Continuity of Education Plan
Seniors & Parents of Seniors:
The Progress is offering a printing and celebration
program known as "Senior Send Off" to any
2020 graduates. CLICK HERE for details
NEW GRAB & GO FOOD DATES
​
CLICK THE ABOVE IMAGE
TO EXPAND
​
​
Congratulations to the 2020 "Queen
of Hearts" winner, Tori Houser.
​
A special thank you goes out to all of the
girls that participated in this year's event.
The money raised from this effort was
used to support the American
Heart Association.
CLICK HERE, OR THE OWL ABOVE,
TO ACCESS RECOMMENDED RESOURCES
FOR PARENTS AND STUDENTS
Current Sophomore & Junior students
and parents: CLICK HERE for a link
to the Clarion Dual Enrollment site
This link is for any current junior or sophomore who would be interested in the online Dual Enrollment program we have had with Clarion University. The link will take you to the list of classes and application. Deadline to apply is May 1. This would be for summer and/or fall classes. If questions, please email Mr. Bonanno. When transcripts are needed, please contact the school so that we can help you.
​
​
2020 Prom
High School Students: The Prom, originally scheduled to be held on Friday, May 1st, has been postponed. It is most likely that this will be a difficult event to get made up. However, if school goes back into session at a reasonable time in May (or earlier) and we have a chance to find a reasonable make-up date (with enough time to properly plan/prepare), we will consider attempting to set a date for this event.
- Mr. Martz

span.style: font-size: 20px; text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
text-align: center; font-size: 26px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 112, 192);

br.br:
** State testing (PSSA, PASA, Keystones) have all been canceled for this year. The state has taken this action, which has been backed up by the federal government as well. **

span.style: font-size: 20px; text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.style: left: 37.7px; top: 540.38px; text-align: center; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.56px; transform: scaleX(0.88205);
div.span:
​
Harmony Area SD is once again participating in the CEP program, which means that every child gets a free breakfast and lunch each school day. CLICK HERE to read more....
​

br.span: The Harmony Area School District will not discriminate in its educational programs, activities, or employment practices, based on race, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, disability, age, religion,ancestry, union membership, or any other legally protected classification. Announcement of this policy is in accordance with state and federal laws, including Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, Sections 503 and 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, and the Americans of Disabilities Act of 1990. Harmony employees or students who have an inquiry or complaint of harassment or discrimination, or who need information about accommodations for persons with disabilities, should contact the Superintendent of the Harmony Area School District at 814-845-2300.

br.br:
​
​
​
​
​
UPDATE: THE STATE HAS CANCELED TESTING
(PSSA, PASA, KEYSTONE) FOR 19-20
STUDENT KEYSTONE
TESTING DATES (19-20)
Literature: 12/10/19 & 12/11/19
Biology: 01/08/20 & 01/09/20
Algebra: 01/14/20 & 01/15/20
PSSA DATES
ELA Window: April 20-24, 2020
Math & Science Window: April 27-May 1, 2020
SPRING KEYSTONE EXAMS
May 11-22, 2020
(all subjects)
Our specific details for PSSA:
ELA on 4/21, 4/22, and 4/23
Math on 4/27 and 4/28
Science on 4/29 and 4/30
